title: League client screwing everything up
body: Hi, whenever I log into the league client it slows everything on my computer and causes constant mini-freezing. For example, when I'm talking on discord with friends, I can hear them fine, but when I log onto League, they suddenly start cutting in and out. It also causes the taskbar and desktop icons to constantly flash in and out of existence, even during a game of league, so if I click on the very bottom of my screen, if takes me out of the game. It usually lasts for the first 5-15 minutes of league, then fixes itself. Any advice on fixing?

replies.body: It sounds like you're having smoe fps issues in game, which can be due to driver problems or third party apps that aren't working well with League.  As a first step, remove any you might be running like play.tv, overlays, recorders, and the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  If your issue persists, go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC and make sure everything is up to date to run the game smoothly.  These resources should get you fixed up, but let me know if you have any questions.
I repaired my client, and that seems to have fixed the issue. Thanks a lot!

I don't think it's FPS, as it normalizes after a few minutes, and I don't have any trouble on other games. I don't use third-party apps and my driver is up to date. The client, not the game seems to be the problem. Also, thanks for the speedy response!
